name: Hong Kong SkyCity Marriott Hotel

reviews.text: We stayed here for only one night with two adults and two children, but the service and the quality was great all around. On arrival there were issues with the booking but this was sorted out after some persistence by the front desk staff. We had access to the executive lounge which proved great for us for breakfast with a nice view and a nice place for internet access and drink over the balcony.
reviews.title: One of the best airport hotels I have stayed at

reviews.text: The service was very friendly and prompt. The pool and spa was great as well, the staff took care of my daughter in the womens change rooms which i thought was very nice of them.
reviews.title: Good location & superb service

reviews.text: We had cocktails in the executive lounge for a light dinner which also proved nice with enough pork buns and dumplings to go around, together with nice bottles of red and a scotch and dry
reviews.title: Very nice hotel, perfect for airport stay or for Lantau

reviews.text: Breakfast was also first rate, which a great omelette, watermelon juice and I just couldn't help myself to the pancakes and waffles...
reviews.title: Best HK Airport Hotel

reviews.text: The rooms must all be triple glazed, because I have had noisier rooms in the city.
reviews.title: Perfect stay near airport

reviews.text: Great hotel and they do look after you. Shuttle service is efficient as is staff.
reviews.title: Great hotel and they look after you

reviews.text: \Wait staff in the bars need a kick in the pants but other than that I highly recommend and this takes so much stress out of getting to and from airport as it is on site. Easy to get to the city with the train so if you only have one night to stay in Hing Kong this is where to stay.
reviews.title: A little pricey, but worth it for the convenience of the location

reviews.text: Stayed here on business as I had an early flight out. Room was very nice, modern, clean, even had an outlet adapter--which was very helpful as I never have enough with me. Staff was very nice. The hotel was very busy the day I was there, but the staff managed to make all of us happy in an efficient manner. Shuttle departed on time for the airport. Would definitely stay here again.
reviews.title: Improved so much

reviews.text: Every year, we have a confernece at the Asiaexpo and we stayed at this hotel for 5 to 6 nights for the past 3 years. What i can say is they tried to improve their services every year and i am so impress with it. The reception worked fast and accurate, the room was clean and comfortable, the buffet breakfast was great. I am so happy for staffs there that tried every effort to make their customers have a comfortable stay. There are 3 hotels near Hong Kong International Airport....if you dont know how to choose, this is the one, try it and you will like it.
reviews.title: Great Views from my window

reviews.text: As a seasoned visitor to the China Marriott in Guangzhou i had no problem in making a reservation at this great hotel. No upgrades to Exec Level was offered even with my high status although there was availability. The shuttle bus from the airport to the hotel was perfect and the check in easy. This property is much more expensive that the Guangzhou Marriott but that's Hong Kong I guess.The view from my room was perfect as i love the airport and room service was fast and very friendly. WiFi in my room always is a help. An early morning check out for a flight to London was easy. Great hotel for an overnight between flights.
reviews.title: Good for a hotel close to the airport

reviews.text: This hotel is very close to the airport, service was quite good.

reviews.title: Wonderful hotel with amazing rooms

reviews.text: I stayed at this hotel after coming back from the Philippines. I was upgraded to a huge suite for free and it felt amazing. Rooms are very stylish and the bathrooms are beautiful. Staff was very nice and the whole hotel is very beautiful. I definitely recommend this hotel to everyone.

I stayed couple of times in this hotel and location close to the airport plus the free shuttle are great if you need to layover for a night. Rooms, lounge and check in are excellent. The restaurant in the second floor serve great cantonesse food

reviews.text: NOTE >> Difficult to get a taxi since it is such a short fare, but the shuttle was fine, you can find it at the far right end of the typical airport shuttles -- no need to stop at the desk or purchase a ticket, Marriott's is free and dedicated, one stop, 4 or 5 minute ride.

description: Nestled on the edge of Lantau Island, with stunning views of the South China Sea, the Hong Kong SkyCity Marriott Hotel is a Hong Kong airport hotel offering a refreshing escape from the bustling city and an alternative landscape for your meetings and conferences. The hotel is near the Hong Kong Airport and is directly connected to AsiaWorld-Expo. It provides luxurious accommodations with 658 guest rooms facing the sea, or golf course, 13 state-of-the-art meeting rooms spanning more than 13,000 square feet of meeting space, five restaurants, pampering spa treats at the boutique Quan Spa and has SkyCity Nine Eagles Golf course on it's door-step. Transportation to and from the hotel is a breeze as it is located next to the Hong Kong International Airport and is just a 28-minute train ride from the city. This modern day oasis is perfect for conferences and business travelers seeking the best of both worlds – the luxury & convenience of contemporary living, set against the peaceful tranquility of Lantau Island.
